data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the state of Nassa a passion to plant another simple church.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nassa, Mozambique
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Nassa, Mozambique honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.section_summary: On average, 159 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Nassa, Mozambique.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, please give the 124,072 believers in the state of Nassa the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Nassa, Mozambique to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Xingoni people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Nassa, Mozambique. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, teach the church in the state of Nassa to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Nassa, Mozambique, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.
